description.narrative: By 2018, programme coordination is effective and efficient., which contributes to Child Protection â€“ General, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2018, 50 per cent of girls and boys, especially the most vulnerable, are better protected against abuses, violence, exploitation and discrimination.
